name: df-ass
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cass, cab(s0, wral(s1, cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), wral(s2, cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), wral(s3, cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), cv(s0), cv(s3)), co(cv(s1), cv(s0), co(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s3)))))))))
comment: A device to add associativity to various sorts of internal operations. The definition is meaningful when ` g ` is a magma at least. (Contributed by FL, 1-Nov-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)
